name: QuickBites
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quick bites
des:
Quick Bites is your skill for easy, healthy meal ideas you can whip up in under 10 minutes. Whether you’re a busy student or a young professional, Quick Bites provides simple recipes that you can make regardless of your cooking skills. Just tell our chef Helen what you want to make, and the skill will suggest a quick, nutritious recipe. Need help while cooking? Quick Bites guides you step-by-step in real-time, so you can focus on creating a delicious meal without the stress. From breakfast to dinner, Quick Bites makes healthy eating fast, fun, and hassle-free!

Currently it is not possible to alter recipes based on specific ingredients and dietary preferences. However, users can choose between different recipes to find the one that matches their needs.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
